entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, described as having a lipless mouth and smiling. He is the leader of the Death Eaters.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The protagonist of the story, who refuses to bow to Voldemort and wants to die with dignity like his father.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: A group of followers of Voldemort, described as laughing at Harry's situation.

entities.name: harry's father
entities.description: Mentioned by Voldemort as an example of how Harry should behave in a duel.

relationships.description: Voldemort is the leader of the Death Eaters, who are laughing at Harry's situation.
Harry and Voldemort are about to duel each other.
Voldemort mentions Harry's father as an example of how Harry should behave in a duel, implying that he wants Harry to die with dignity like his father.
